title: Военный эксперт высказался об ответе России на действия Финляндии в НАТО
cleaned_sentences: The militarization of Finland was not a surprise to Russia, Moscow was preparing for this.
The military observer and founder of the Military Russia Russia website Dmitry Kornev spoke out about the actions of Helsinki in NATO and the response of Moscow in a conversation with RIA Novosti.
According to him, Russia took measures to stop the threat.
Here you can include the creation of two new military districts and the formation of a number of new units in this section of the border.
“Of course, the entry of Finland into NATO affects the position of the Northern Fleet, which has always been a bearer of a significant part of our missile potential.
But we are observing the redistribution towards the Pacific, ”said a military expert.
He noticed that the fleet is adopted by the nuclear submarines-rake-bearers "Borea-A".
Kornev also added that there is a tendency to strengthen defense on the northwest flank.
Earlier, retired colonel, military expert Anatoly Matviychuk said that Finland had a very small combat potential compared to Russia even after the country's entry into the North Atlantic Alliance.
“She cannot withstand any possible our armed associations and formations on the border with Finland,” Matviychuk said.
As Mikhail Ulyanov, a regular representative of Russia at international organizations in Vienna, Finland did not benefit from joining NATO, the country was in a difficult situation.
